name: SDM
summary: SDM is connectivity framework to work with wireless scanners
description:
SerialioDeviceManager is powerful and flexible connectivity framework for iOS providing a fast and easy path for 3rd party applications to work with wireless devices such as RFID-NFC, scanners, Barcode scanners, Scales, Calipers, Distance Measuring equipment, and more.
Scanfob® and idChamp® brand readers/writes from Serialio Ltd. and hundreds of other models of devices from other vendors are supported.
